com.github.kaiwinter.androidremotenotifications.model.impl

Class VersionCodePolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kaiwinter.androidremotenotifications.model.impl.VersionCodePolicy

  • public final class VersionCodePolicy
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the app version codes on which a notification should be shown. If the current app install doesn't match this VersionCodePolicy the notification will not be shown. There are three ways to define on which versions of your app the notification should be shown: onAllBefore, onAllAfter and onSpecific. You can also mix them but have to keep them sane. Only one of the previous named parameters have to match to let the notification show. They are evaluated in the previous named order.

    • Method Detail

      • hasBeShownForThisVersion

        public boolean hasBeShownForThisVersion(int appVersionCode)
        Checks if one of onAllAfter, onAllBefore or onSpecific matches the given versionCode. If one matches true is returned, else false.
        Parameters:
        appVersionCode - The version code to match against this VersionCodePolicy.
        Returns:
        true if the notification should be shown, else false.
